post.text: Don't miss out! Join them: hillaryclinton.com/makeaplan

comment.author: Elizabeth
comment.text: A new poll of likely voters in New Hampshire by MassINC Polling Group for Boston-area public radio station WBUR shows Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump one point ahead of Democratic rival Hillary Clinton. The gap is well inside the poll's 4.4% margin of error.
